markdownRemark.html:
Automated trading strategies using Interactive Brokers TWS API, Django REST, React and Telegram

The more people using the same strategy, the overall less efficient it become. T﻿his is why building your own tools could make stand out your trading strategies. I﻿ have developed a fully custom trading bot, making use of the following technologies:

  • TWS API (Interactive Brokers Trading Workstation API)
  • T﻿rading View
  • D﻿jango REST
  • R﻿eact
  • T﻿elegram

Project Structure

H﻿ere's a video which shows the application running.

frontmatter.title: Automated trading strategies using Interactive Brokers TWS API, Django REST, React and Telegram
frontmatter.description: Create your own tools to automate trading strategies. The software provides a WebApp and a Telegram bot to monitor and control your strategies
